infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take a pic and then upload it to the Drive feature, you can upload files by taking a new photo or by opening the library and selecting it.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the library access to select a file and then upload it to the Drive feature, you can upload files by taking a new photo or by opening the library and selecting it.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app uses the permission to save files into the device by downloading files from the Drive files, you can see this feature on the 'Mis documentos' section.
